SA05n895:7: bhaktebhyo varade devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 1 ||
SA05n895:12: siddhānāṃ pūjite devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 3 ||
SA05n895:14: ugratāre namo nityaṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 4 ||
SA05n895:21: snāne dāne tathā jāpye balidāne tathā kratau |
SA05n895:22: prasthāne ca na śakto'haṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 8 ||
SA05n895:24: tvāṃ vinā na gatiryasya trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 9 ||
SA05n895:28: devīṃ sampūjya yatnena labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam || 11 ||
SA05n895:29: aṣṭamyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ navamyāṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ |
SA05n895:31: mokṣārthī labhate mokṣaṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam |
SA05n895:33: idaṃ stotraṃ paṭhitvā tu saṃgrāme praviśennaraḥ |
SA05n895:34: tasya śatruḥ kṣayaṃ yāti sadā prajñā prajāyate || 14 ||
SA05n895:36: ya idaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ śubhaṃ tasya na saṃśayaḥ || 15 ||
